title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 347.7 - Decision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 347.7 - Decision

State Regulations

The decision of the Chiropractic Practice Committee may be
made in executive session. In arriving at a determination, the decision of two
members of the Chiropractic Practice Committee shall constitute the decision of
the committee, and be binding upon the parties. The decision or determination
shall be signed by members of the Chiropractic Practice Committee making the
decision, and shall be filed with the record of the case. Copies of notice of
decision shall be mailed to the parties to the dispute. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
347.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
